did.abstract: Maurice G. Blair (1889-1963) was a vice principal and then a principal in the Los Angeles city schools. He also held various supervisorial posts in the Los Angeles City School System. The collection consists of correspondence, clippings, photographs, yearbooks, and memorabilia relating to his career.

bioghist.head: Biography
bioghist.p: Blair was born in Atlantic City, New Jersey, on September 17, 1889; graduated from University of Southern California; was a vice principal and then a principal in the Los Angeles city schools; held various supervisorial posts in Los Angeles City School System; assistant supervisor, educational curriculum division; died January 21, 1963.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Collection consists of correspondence, clippings, photographs, yearbooks, and memorabilia relating to the career of Los Angeles educator and curriculum specialist, Dr. Maurice G. Blair.
